definition: propranolol (beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure)
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: The oral propranolol test was conducted for positive rate.
sentences.chinese: 進行口服心得安試驗，觀察其陽性率。

sentences.english: A small dose of propranolol was effective in 61% patients.
sentences.chinese: 患者小劑量心得安治療有效。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the reliability of the operations used in Propranolol test.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討我科心得安試驗採取的操作方法的可靠性。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the mechanism of ventricular arrhythmia by propranolol for clinical test.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討室性心律失常在心得安試驗中的發生機制。

definition: propranolol (beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure)
